reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Interesting reading list.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Difficult to follow. Assignments often unclear and poorly explained.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Extensive knowledge but lectures can be dry. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Always available for extra help. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Moves too quickly through material. Not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions. Assignments are relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject. Could improve on explaining practical applications.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and inspiring. Makes art come alive in her lectures.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Confusing explanations. Seems uninterested in student success.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging field trips and hands-on projects. Very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenging material. Encourages debate but can be intimidating.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lessons. Excellent mentor.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Biased presentations. Doesn't encourage diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Assignments can be time-consuming but worthwhile.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Real-world examples are helpful. Could improve on feedback for projects.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Incredible wealth of knowledge. Makes every class an adventure.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain complex concepts. Exams are much harder than homework.
